caption: Signature Mint - Mint ERC-721 From Signature
doc: Use a signed payload to mint a ERC-721 NFT.

AFr.caption: Payload
AFr.doc: The payload generated using the Generate ERC-721 NFT Mint Signature sever side action.
AFr.name: payload

AFs.caption: NFT Contract Address
AFs.doc: The NFT smart contract the NFT will be signature minted from.
AFs.name: nft_contract_address
